snippet.title: Integral Podcasters (Ep. 6: Daniel Thorson)
snippet.description:
In this new Integral Stage series, we will be talking with podcasters, YouTubers, and other media producers who are trying to offer, or who can't help but offer, more integrative perspectives.  Who are these people, what do they collectively understand and point towards, and how can they be interlinked, mutually supported, clarified, and amplified?

In episode six, Layman Pascal talks with metamodern podcaster, Daniel Thorson, on the art of podcasting, the dynamics of depth conversations, the return of sincerity, the power of "concepts," and the interrelationship of soul, emptiness, and transformation.  Daniel is the creator of the Emerge podcast and a monastic at the Monastic Academy in Vermont.

Links and Resources
